name: post_mortem_agent
description: An agent for generating structured and comprehensive post mortem reports about cyber attacks and incidents. The agent can also create YARA rule files for new incidents using incident context and IOCs.

skills.name: Generate Post Mortem Report
skills.description: Generates a structured and comprehensive post mortem report for a cyber attack or incident, including incident name, date, summary, impact, timeline, root cause, mitigation, lessons learned, and recommendations.
examples: Generate a post mortem report for the ransomware attack on 2025-08-13.
Create a comprehensive incident report for the phishing incident affecting the finance department.
Summarize the lessons learned from the recent DDoS attack.

skills.name: Create YARA Rule
skills.description: Creates a YARA rule file based on incident details if the incident is new. The rule uses incident context and IOCs to generate a basic YARA file.
examples: Create a YARA rule for the new malware discovered in the August 2025 breach.
Generate a detection rule for the phishing campaign described in the incident report.
